subject: Re: [junit] httpunit versus HttpUrlConnection
msgSnippet: ... You don t. You make a choice according to your needs. HttpUrlConnection is a part of standard Java packages and provides basic HTTP functionality. httpunit
messageBody:
On 06/09/05, nadine ...... <nato20062@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
> can anyone explain for me please if the
> HttpUrlConnection is used to make a requests to the
> HTTP server, so why do we have to use httpunit?
>
> thanks in advance
> bye
>
>
You don't. You make a choice according to your needs. HttpUrlConnection is a
part of standard Java packages and provides basic HTTP functionality.
httpunit is a separate application which provides a much richer object model
for interacting with HTTP.

James


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
